sources.title: Gypsies are found near heaven
sources.description:
Based on the stories of M. Gorky. A beautiful legend about the love of two young gypsies - Loiko and Rada. Their suddenly flashed feeling is mutual, but the pride and tough temper of the gypsy characters will bring the lovers to tragedy...

IMDb rating: 7,4

Year of production: 1976

Director: Emil Loteanu
Screenwriter: Emil Loteanu
Composer: Evgeny Doga
Operator: Vronsky Sergey
Production designer: Yasyukevich Felix
Cast: Brondukov Borislav, Toma Svetlana, Grigoriu Grigory, Shkurya Ion (Ivan), Andreichenko Pavel, Chernaya Lyalya, Shishkov Mikhail, Volshaninova Nelli, Gavrilov Vsevolod, Dimitriu Gheorghe, Mulaev Barasbi, Finiti Sergiu, Simchich Vasily, Buzylev-Kretso Dmitry, Vishnevsky Belash, Volshaninov Nikolai, Mokanu Dumitru

00:00:00 Movie start
00:32:55 Song of Gypsies
